content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I accept this contribution because it's well written and it has its place in clash of code in my concern

Goal
* Please change "except D" to "except d or D".

* The Goal section states that "dr" should be translated to "d17", but in the first test, "dr" is translated to "d18".

* Please add "(ignoring case)" after "the index of the letter".

Constraints
* Please add:

1 ≤ length of [[sentence]] ≤ 200

Cases
* "DD" appears in Validator 10 only. Please include it in Test 10 as well.

* Please add a pair of new cases to cover:
  • "Dd"
  • "dD"
  • "D" followed by a punctuation.

Thanks.

In the input section, please replace your text by :
One single line : the [[sentence]] to treat
Thanks, I've added "to process." in the input section :)
Thanks, the fixes have been applied! Lmk if there's anything else :)
